roleset.name: to attract or charm
roleset.note: CAPTIVATE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'captivate' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from captivate.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: Broadcasters have a healthy appreciation of the role [0] [entertainment values]-2 play [*T*-1] in *trace*-2 captivating an audience .
